title.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, Jan. 15, 1923. Congregation Anshe Kneseth Israel to Contribute $500 Annually to the [Hebrew] Theological College

div.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, Jan. 15, 1923. CONGREGATION ANSHE KNESETH ISRAEL TO CONTRIBUTE $500 ANNUALLY TO THE [HEBREW] THEOLOGICAL COLLEGE

body.p: At a membership meeting of the Congregation Anshe Kneseth Israel last night, the decision was made to contribute $500 a year to the [Hebrew] Theological College and $50 to the Zionist organizations.
At this meeting two committees were elected to take up the problem of a center for the youth: one committee is to establish the center and the other is to work out a program for it.
